segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a lay follower with five qualities is cast down to hell.
They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, and use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: A lay follower with these five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato upāsako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: A lay follower with five qualities is raised up to heaven.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti … pe … surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti.
segments.en: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato upāsako yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: A lay follower with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
